037package org.jfree.chart.legend;
038
039import java.awt.Color;
040import java.awt.Font;
041import java.awt.Graphics2D;
042import java.awt.Paint;
043import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
044import java.io.IOException;
045import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
046import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
047import java.io.Serializable;
048import org.jfree.chart.ChartElementVisitor;
049
050import org.jfree.chart.block.Arrangement;
051import org.jfree.chart.block.Block;
052import org.jfree.chart.block.BlockContainer;
053import org.jfree.chart.block.BlockFrame;
054import org.jfree.chart.block.BlockResult;
055import org.jfree.chart.block.BorderArrangement;
056import org.jfree.chart.block.CenterArrangement;
057import org.jfree.chart.block.ColumnArrangement;
058import org.jfree.chart.block.EntityBlockParams;
059import org.jfree.chart.block.FlowArrangement;
060import org.jfree.chart.block.LabelBlock;
061import org.jfree.chart.block.RectangleConstraint;
062import org.jfree.chart.entity.EntityCollection;
063import org.jfree.chart.entity.StandardEntityCollection;
064import org.jfree.chart.entity.TitleEntity;
065import org.jfree.chart.event.TitleChangeEvent;
066import org.jfree.chart.api.RectangleAnchor;
067import org.jfree.chart.api.RectangleEdge;
068import org.jfree.chart.api.PublicCloneable;
069import org.jfree.chart.internal.SerialUtils;
070import org.jfree.chart.api.RectangleInsets;
071import org.jfree.chart.block.Size2D;

076
077
078/**
079 * A chart title that displays a legend for the data in the chart.
080 * <P>
081 * The title can be populated with legend items manually, or you can assign a
082 * reference to the plot, in which case the legend items will be automatically
083 * created to match the dataset(s).
084 */
085public class LegendTitle extends Title
086        implements Cloneable, PublicCloneable, Serializable {
087
088    /** For serialization. */
089    private static final long serialVersionUID = 2644010518533854633L;
090
091    /** The default item font. */
092    public static final Font DEFAULT_ITEM_FONT
093            = new Font("SansSerif", Font.PLAIN, 12);
094
095    /** The default item paint. */
096    public static final Paint DEFAULT_ITEM_PAINT = Color.BLACK;
097
098    /** The sources for legend items. */
099    private LegendItemSource[] sources;
100
101    /** The background paint (possibly {@code null}). */
102    private transient Paint backgroundPaint;
103
104    /** The edge for the legend item graphic relative to the text. */
105    private RectangleEdge legendItemGraphicEdge;
106
107    /** The anchor point for the legend item graphic. */
108    private RectangleAnchor legendItemGraphicAnchor;
109
110    /** The legend item graphic location. */
111    private RectangleAnchor legendItemGraphicLocation;
112
113    /** The padding for the legend item graphic. */
114    private RectangleInsets legendItemGraphicPadding;
115
116    /** The item font. */
117    private Font itemFont;
118
119    /** The item paint. */
120    private transient Paint itemPaint;
121
122    /** The padding for the item labels. */
123    private RectangleInsets itemLabelPadding;
124
125    /**
126     * A container that holds and displays the legend items.
127     */
128    private BlockContainer items;
129
130    /**
131     * The layout for the legend when it is positioned at the top or bottom
132     * of the chart.
133     */
134    private Arrangement hLayout;
135
136    /**
137     * The layout for the legend when it is positioned at the left or right
138     * of the chart.
139     */
140    private Arrangement vLayout;
141
142    /**
143     * An optional container for wrapping the legend items (allows for adding
144     * a title or other text to the legend).
145     */
146    private BlockContainer wrapper;
147
148    /**
149     * Whether to render legend items in ascending or descending order.
150     */
151    private SortOrder sortOrder;
152
153    /**
154     * Constructs a new (empty) legend for the specified source.
155     *
156     * @param source  the source.
157     */
158    public LegendTitle(LegendItemSource source) {
159        this(source, new FlowArrangement(), new ColumnArrangement());
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Creates a new legend title with the specified arrangement.
164     *
165     * @param source  the source.
166     * @param hLayout  the horizontal item arrangement ({@code null} not
167     *                 permitted).
168     * @param vLayout  the vertical item arrangement ({@code null} not
169     *                 permitted).
170     */
171    public LegendTitle(LegendItemSource source,
172                       Arrangement hLayout, Arrangement vLayout) {
173        this.sources = new LegendItemSource[] {source};
174        this.items = new BlockContainer(hLayout);
175        this.hLayout = hLayout;
176        this.vLayout = vLayout;
177        this.backgroundPaint = null;
178        this.legendItemGraphicEdge = RectangleEdge.LEFT;
179        this.legendItemGraphicAnchor = RectangleAnchor.CENTER;
180        this.legendItemGraphicLocation = RectangleAnchor.CENTER;
181        this.legendItemGraphicPadding = new RectangleInsets(2.0, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0);
182        this.itemFont = DEFAULT_ITEM_FONT;
183        this.itemPaint = DEFAULT_ITEM_PAINT;
184        this.itemLabelPadding = new RectangleInsets(2.0, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0);
185        this.sortOrder = SortOrder.ASCENDING;
186    }
187
188    /**
189     * Returns the legend item sources.
190     *
191     * @return The sources.
192     */
193    public LegendItemSource[] getSources() {
194        return this.sources;
195    }
196
197    /**
198     * Sets the legend item sources and sends a {@link TitleChangeEvent} to
199     * all registered listeners.
200     *
201     * @param sources  the sources ({@code null} not permitted).
202     */
203    public void setSources(LegendItemSource[] sources) {
204        Args.nullNotPermitted(sources, "sources");
205        this.sources = sources;
206        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Returns the background paint.
211     *
212     * @return The background paint (possibly {@code null}).
213     */
214    public Paint getBackgroundPaint() {
215        return this.backgroundPaint;
216    }
217
218    /**
219     * Sets the background paint for the legend and sends a
220     * {@link TitleChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
221     *
222     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} permitted).
223     */
224    public void setBackgroundPaint(Paint paint) {
225        this.backgroundPaint = paint;
226        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
227    }
228
229    /**
230     * Returns the location of the shape within each legend item.
231     *
232     * @return The location (never {@code null}).
233     */
234    public RectangleEdge getLegendItemGraphicEdge() {
235        return this.legendItemGraphicEdge;
236    }
237
238    /**
239     * Sets the location of the shape within each legend item.
240     *
241     * @param edge  the edge ({@code null} not permitted).
242     */
243    public void setLegendItemGraphicEdge(RectangleEdge edge) {
244        Args.nullNotPermitted(edge, "edge");
245        this.legendItemGraphicEdge = edge;
246        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
247    }
248
249    /**
250     * Returns the legend item graphic anchor.
251     *
252     * @return The graphic anchor (never {@code null}).
253     */
254    public RectangleAnchor getLegendItemGraphicAnchor() {
255        return this.legendItemGraphicAnchor;
256    }
257
258    /**
259     * Sets the anchor point used for the graphic in each legend item.
260     *
261     * @param anchor  the anchor point ({@code null} not permitted).
262     */
263    public void setLegendItemGraphicAnchor(RectangleAnchor anchor) {
264        Args.nullNotPermitted(anchor, "anchor");
265        this.legendItemGraphicAnchor = anchor;
266    }
267
268    /**
269     * Returns the legend item graphic location.
270     *
271     * @return The location (never {@code null}).
272     */
273    public RectangleAnchor getLegendItemGraphicLocation() {
274        return this.legendItemGraphicLocation;
275    }
276
277    /**
278     * Sets the legend item graphic location.
279     *
280     * @param anchor  the anchor ({@code null} not permitted).
281     */
282    public void setLegendItemGraphicLocation(RectangleAnchor anchor) {
283        this.legendItemGraphicLocation = anchor;
284    }
285
286    /**
287     * Returns the padding that will be applied to each item graphic.
288     *
289     * @return The padding (never {@code null}).
290     */
291    public RectangleInsets getLegendItemGraphicPadding() {
292        return this.legendItemGraphicPadding;
293    }
294
295    /**
296     * Sets the padding that will be applied to each item graphic in the
297     * legend and sends a {@link TitleChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
298     *
299     * @param padding  the padding ({@code null} not permitted).
300     */
301    public void setLegendItemGraphicPadding(RectangleInsets padding) {
302        Args.nullNotPermitted(padding, "padding");
303        this.legendItemGraphicPadding = padding;
304        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
305    }
306
307    /**
308     * Returns the item font.
309     *
310     * @return The font (never {@code null}).
311     */
312    public Font getItemFont() {
313        return this.itemFont;
314    }
315
316    /**
317     * Sets the item font and sends a {@link TitleChangeEvent} to
318     * all registered listeners.
319     *
320     * @param font  the font ({@code null} not permitted).
321     */
322    public void setItemFont(Font font) {
323        Args.nullNotPermitted(font, "font");
324        this.itemFont = font;
325        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
326    }
327
328    /**
329     * Returns the item paint.
330     *
331     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
332     */
333    public Paint getItemPaint() {
334        return this.itemPaint;
335    }
336
337    /**
338     * Sets the item paint.
339     *
340     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} not permitted).
341     */
342    public void setItemPaint(Paint paint) {
343        Args.nullNotPermitted(paint, "paint");
344        this.itemPaint = paint;
345        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
346    }
347
348    /**
349     * Returns the padding used for the items labels.
350     *
351     * @return The padding (never {@code null}).
352     */
353    public RectangleInsets getItemLabelPadding() {
354        return this.itemLabelPadding;
355    }
356
357    /**
358     * Sets the padding used for the item labels in the legend.
359     *
360     * @param padding  the padding ({@code null} not permitted).
361     */
362    public void setItemLabelPadding(RectangleInsets padding) {
363        Args.nullNotPermitted(padding, "padding");
364        this.itemLabelPadding = padding;
365        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
366    }
367
368    /**
369     * Gets the order used to display legend items.
370     * 
371     * @return The order (never {@code null}).
372     */
373    public SortOrder getSortOrder() {
374        return this.sortOrder;
375    }
376
377    /**
378     * Sets the order used to display legend items.
379     * 
380     * @param order Specifies ascending or descending order ({@code null}
381     *              not permitted).
382     */
383    public void setSortOrder(SortOrder order) {
384        Args.nullNotPermitted(order, "order");
385        this.sortOrder = order;
386        notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(this));
387    }
388
389    /**
390     * Fetches the latest legend items.
391     */
392    protected void fetchLegendItems() {
393        this.items.clear();
394        RectangleEdge p = getPosition();
395        if (RectangleEdge.isTopOrBottom(p)) {
396            this.items.setArrangement(this.hLayout);
397        }
398        else {
399            this.items.setArrangement(this.vLayout);
400        }
401
402        if (this.sortOrder.equals(SortOrder.ASCENDING)) {
403            for (int s = 0; s < this.sources.length; s++) {
404                LegendItemCollection legendItems =
405                    this.sources[s].getLegendItems();
406                if (legendItems != null) {
407                    for (int i = 0; i < legendItems.getItemCount(); i++) {
408                        addItemBlock(legendItems.get(i));
409                    }
410                }
411            }
412        }
413        else {
414            for (int s = this.sources.length - 1; s >= 0; s--) {
415                LegendItemCollection legendItems =
416                    this.sources[s].getLegendItems();
417                if (legendItems != null) {
418                    for (int i = legendItems.getItemCount()-1; i >= 0; i--) {
419                        addItemBlock(legendItems.get(i));
420                    }
421                }
422            }
423        }
424    }
425
426    private void addItemBlock(LegendItem item) {
427        Block block = createLegendItemBlock(item);
428        this.items.add(block);
429    }
430
431    /**
432     * Creates a legend item block.
433     *
434     * @param item  the legend item.
435     *
436     * @return The block.
437     */
438    protected Block createLegendItemBlock(LegendItem item) {
439        BlockContainer result;
440        LegendGraphic lg = lg(item);
441                LegendItemBlockContainer legendItem = new LegendItemBlockContainer(
442                new BorderArrangement(), item.getDataset(),
443                item.getSeriesKey());
444        legendItem.add(lg, this.legendItemGraphicEdge);
445        Font textFont = textFont(item);
446                Paint textPaint = item.getLabelPaint();
447        if (textPaint == null) {
448            textPaint = this.itemPaint;
449        }
450        LabelBlock labelBlock = new LabelBlock(item.getLabel(), textFont,
451                textPaint);
452        labelBlock.setPadding(this.itemLabelPadding);
453        legendItem.add(labelBlock);
454        legendItem.setToolTipText(item.getToolTipText());
455        legendItem.setURLText(item.getURLText());
456
457        result = new BlockContainer(new CenterArrangement());
458        result.add(legendItem);
459
460        return result;
461    }
462
463        private Font textFont(LegendItem item) {
464                Font textFont = item.getLabelFont();
465                if (textFont == null) {
466                        textFont = this.itemFont;
467                }
468                return textFont;
469        }
470
471        private LegendGraphic lg(LegendItem item) {
472                LegendGraphic lg = new LegendGraphic(item.getShape(), item.getFillPaint());
473                lg.setFillPaintTransformer(item.getFillPaintTransformer());
474                lg.setShapeFilled(item.isShapeFilled());
475                lg.setLine(item.getLine());
476                lg.setLineStroke(item.getLineStroke());
477                lg.setLinePaint(item.getLinePaint());
478                lg.setLineVisible(item.isLineVisible());
479                lg.setShapeVisible(item.isShapeVisible());
480                lg.setShapeOutlineVisible(item.isShapeOutlineVisible());
481                lg.setOutlinePaint(item.getOutlinePaint());
482                lg.setOutlineStroke(item.getOutlineStroke());
483                lg.setPadding(this.legendItemGraphicPadding);
484                lg.setShapeAnchor(getLegendItemGraphicAnchor());
485                lg.setShapeLocation(getLegendItemGraphicLocation());
486                return lg;
487        }
488
489    /**
490     * Returns the container that holds the legend items.
491     *
492     * @return The container for the legend items.
493     */
494    public BlockContainer getItemContainer() {
495        return this.items;
496    }
497
498    /**
499     * Arranges the contents of the block, within the given constraints, and
500     * returns the block size.
501     *
502     * @param g2  the graphics device.
503     * @param constraint  the constraint ({@code null} not permitted).
504     *
505     * @return The block size (in Java2D units, never {@code null}).
506     */
507    @Override
508    public Size2D arrange(Graphics2D g2, RectangleConstraint constraint) {
509        Size2D result = new Size2D();
510        fetchLegendItems();
511        if (this.items.isEmpty()) {
512            return result;
513        }
514        BlockContainer container = container();
515                RectangleConstraint c = toContentConstraint(constraint);
516        Size2D size = container.arrange(g2, c);
517        result.height = calculateTotalHeight(size.height);
518        result.width = calculateTotalWidth(size.width);
519        return result;
520    }
521
522        private BlockContainer container() {
523                BlockContainer container = this.wrapper;
524                if (container == null) {
525                        container = this.items;
526                }
527                return container;
528        }
529
530    /**
531     * Receives a chart element visitor. 
532     * 
533     * @param visitor  the visitor ({@code null} not permitted).
534     */
535    @Override
536    public void receive(ChartElementVisitor visitor) {
537        // FIXME : visit the legend components
538        super.receive(visitor);
539    }
540
541    /**
542     * Draws the title on a Java 2D graphics device (such as the screen or a
543     * printer).
544     *
545     * @param g2  the graphics device.
546     * @param area  the available area for the title.
547     */
548    @Override
549    public void draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area) {
550        draw(g2, area, null);
551    }
552
553    /**
554     * Draws the block within the specified area.
555     *
556     * @param g2  the graphics device.
557     * @param area  the area.
558     * @param params  ignored ({@code null} permitted).
559     *
560     * @return An {@link org.jfree.chart.block.EntityBlockResult} or
561     *         {@code null}.
562     */
563    @Override
564    public Object draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area, Object params) {
565        Rectangle2D target = (Rectangle2D) area.clone();
566        Rectangle2D hotspot = (Rectangle2D) area.clone();
567        StandardEntityCollection sec = null;
568        if (params instanceof EntityBlockParams
569                && ((EntityBlockParams) params).getGenerateEntities()) {
570            sec = new StandardEntityCollection();
571            sec.add(new TitleEntity(hotspot, this));
572        }
573        target = trimMargin(target);
574        if (this.backgroundPaint != null) {
575            g2.setPaint(this.backgroundPaint);
576            g2.fill(target);
577        }
578        BlockFrame border = getFrame();
579        border.draw(g2, target);
580        border.getInsets().trim(target);
581        BlockContainer container = this.wrapper;
582        if (container == null) {
583            container = this.items;
584        }
585        target = trimPadding(target);
586        Object val = container.draw(g2, target, params);
587        if (val instanceof BlockResult) {
588            EntityCollection ec = ((BlockResult) val).getEntityCollection();
589            if (ec != null && sec != null) {
590                sec.addAll(ec);
591                ((BlockResult) val).setEntityCollection(sec);
592            }
593        }
594        return val;
595    }
596
597    /**
598     * Returns the wrapper container, if any.
599     *
600     * @return The wrapper container (possibly {@code null}).
601     */
602    public BlockContainer getWrapper() {
603        return this.wrapper;
604    }
605
606    /**
607     * Sets the wrapper container for the legend.
608     *
609     * @param wrapper  the wrapper container.
610     */
611    public void setWrapper(BlockContainer wrapper) {
612        this.wrapper = wrapper;
613    }
614
615    /**
616     * Tests this title for equality with an arbitrary object.
617     *
618     * @param obj  the object ({@code null} permitted).
619     *
620     * @return A boolean.
621     */
622    @Override
623    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
624        if (obj == this) {
625            return true;
626        }
627        if (!(obj instanceof LegendTitle)) {
628            return false;
629        }
630        if (!super.equals(obj)) {
631            return false;
632        }
633        LegendTitle that = (LegendTitle) obj;
634        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.backgroundPaint, that.backgroundPaint)) {
635            return false;
636        }
637        if (this.legendItemGraphicEdge != that.legendItemGraphicEdge) {
638            return false;
639        }
640        if (this.legendItemGraphicAnchor != that.legendItemGraphicAnchor) {
641            return false;
642        }
643        if (this.legendItemGraphicLocation != that.legendItemGraphicLocation) {
644            return false;
645        }
646        if (!this.itemFont.equals(that.itemFont)) {
647            return false;
648        }
649        if (!this.itemPaint.equals(that.itemPaint)) {
650            return false;
651        }
652        if (!this.hLayout.equals(that.hLayout)) {
653            return false;
654        }
655        if (!this.vLayout.equals(that.vLayout)) {
656            return false;
657        }
658        if (!this.sortOrder.equals(that.sortOrder)) {
659            return false;
660        }
661        return true;
662    }
663
664    /**
665     * Provides serialization support.
666     *
667     * @param stream  the output stream.
668     *
669     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
670     */
671    private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
672        stream.defaultWriteObject();
673        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.backgroundPaint, stream);
674        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.itemPaint, stream);
675    }
676
677    /**
678     * Provides serialization support.
679     *
680     * @param stream  the input stream.
681     *
682     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
683     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a classpath problem.
684     */
685    private void readObject(ObjectInputStream stream)
686        throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
687        stream.defaultReadObject();
688        this.backgroundPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
689        this.itemPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
690    }
691
692}
